name: Get To The Orange Door (itch)
description:
My name is Andrew Smith, I am 21 years old, and I have been making video games since I was 17. I started my company "Arcade Coin" back in 2015 right after graduating, and for the last two and a half years I have been working on GTTOD as a solo project. It is now nearing completion, so I figured I'd hop on over here and let you guys know I exist again!

On September 16th, 2016, I released my first demo for GTTOD, and it was met with some pretty negative reviews. Not a lot of people liked it, although they loved the concept. Nearly two years later, GTTOD has 92% positive reviews on Steam and has a pretty decent following on Reddit and Discord. Not bad for a solo project I concepted out while eating a bowl of cereal!

I now work on GTTOD full time, and I post regular updates online to all the fans who watch! I have also worked on a few other projects with a team, and recently we even won the Gooseberry Game Jam! You can check out my other projects by clicking on my profile.

Thanks for reading, and I hope you have fun playing!\

-Andrew, GTTOD Dev
